description.value:
Small pockets of humanity eke out a life in environments harsh enough to kill others of their species, and over the span of generations they develop an immunity to these conditions. Humans with this species trait gain a +2 species bonus to Fortitude saves against environmental hazards and radiation effects. In addition, they reduce the duration of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.ZacF0l6IwqBwToTJ]{Sickened} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.LoRydw1D4bqlbkA2]{Nauseated} conditions by 1 round.

This replaces skilled.
